taskbody.prereq: you must have already extended application with local field(s).

step.cmd: Select the domain model extending the application. You can either:

choices.choice:
Right click and select
Properties Design Studio Code Generation
Open the domain in the editor in the editor and hit keys Ctrl+G .

taskbody.result:
Code is generated and deployed.
Local Ref order musts respect the existing T24 setting. The new local ref must then be the last one. If you get the error message "CANNOT CHANGE OLD REF"
this means you are not synchronized with T24 environment. Please import local ref for that application again and redo the extension with new local field.
